common.messages

Class BrokerMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.messages.Message
      • common.messages.BrokerMessage

  • public class BrokerMessage
extends Message
    Message format that is used for interaction between the BrokerService and the publishers/subscribers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BrokerMessage.StatusType

      Constructors

      BrokerMessage()
      Constructs a KVPubSubMessage with no initial values

      Constructs a KVPubSubMessage object with a given array of bytes that forms the message.
      BrokerMessage(java.lang.String msg)
      Constructs a KVPubSubMessage object with a given String that forms the message.

      • serialize

        public BrokerMessage serialize()
        Serializes the data of the current TextMessage into a String with format {StatusType: , key: , username: } and returns the result in a new TextMessage
        Returns:
        Serialized String ready for sending to the server.

      • deserialize

        public BrokerMessage deserialize()
        Deserializes a String received from the server. The message {StatusType: , key: , username: } is split into its values and a new TextMessage with these values is returned.
        Returns:
        TextMessage with received Status, Key
